Name: Csound
column12: binding from Haskell (hCsound), C, C++, Python, Java, Lua, Lisp, JavaScript

Name: Pure Data
column12: bindings for Python, Lua, Java, GStreamer. the Camomile plugin may host PD as plugin within DAW. PD-extended presently has multiple options to host LADSPA plugins within PD environment.

Name: SuperCollider
column12: LADSPA Host, scsynth can be controlled by OSC messages (Haskell, Scala, Python, Ruby, Scheme etc.)
